评论详情: I needed some emergency sandals for my go bag. It took a little getting used to with the straps, but once you figure it out, these are great in a pinch!
Realy love you can adjust in many ways. Good quality and looks good. Is kind of hard to learn the corrwct way to adjust, but ones you get it, works wanderful.
Favorite shoes. Wear them everyday. Hate to put on "professional" shoes!  Feel balanced, just enough protection from ground.
Absolutely comfortable. Light, easy to wear and I still have an intimate relationship woth the ground! The shoes allow my little piggys to be free and do what they will!

I have had a lot of pairs of Xero sandals because I love the fit and lightweight and flexible soles --- that being said, I have to keep ordering because they only last a matter of a few months before the straps break. You can go through the process it seems of contacting the company for warranty, and mailing the shoes back, but the discount they give you on a new pair was not worth it for me given the cost of shipping and my time.
Way too big for stated size. Ive had fitment problems with other Xero products. I won’t bother with this brand again due to bad customer experiences with them.

I found these comfortable once I got them adjusted right, but I have the same problem with them as every other pair of Xeroes I've owned: the soles wear out unbelievable fast.  This will be my final pair of Xeroes, I refuse to pay a premium price for footwear that won't last a full season.
These are my husbands second pair of these shoes. He likes that they are lightweight and basically feels like youre not wearing shoes

评论概述: Flat sole takes some getting used to.
评论详情: Not much of a shoe but yet cost as much.

评论概述: Comfortable at a good price point
评论详情: It's difficult to find good barefoot sandals for under $100, not including shipping. So the fact that I can buy these on Amazon for $60 was a major selling point. I bought the men's version for a little extra width, because in my experience, women's Xeros are too narrow for my extra-wide feet. These were comfortable right out of the box, feel like a second skin, and are the perfect width. I adjusted the straps slightly, and am very happy with them. I wore them for a water balloon fight with my kids this weekend and there was zero slipping or sliding. I'm satisfied with the grip. Sizing is accurate. Will update later on durability, but they feel solid.

评论概述: Something weird about the thong attachment but they are ok if you don't want cushioning
评论详情: I have been using Xero shoes for at least five years or more now and this is my third pair of their thong sandals.  I like that the "cushion" now extends the whole footbed but the bottom attachment for the thong sits funny on one of the two shoes and that's rather uncomfortable.  If I had time to return and re-order I would have.  Xero shoes are fast fashion, at the end of the day, even if they are not so cheap in cost, so limit your expectations;).  They are zero drop, which my feet need, they have minimal support and cushion.  I usually go to the supermarket and buy gel inserts and cut a line between the big toe and the next and slide them into the sandals if I am walking a lot (amusement parks and such) and that's enough for me to be comfortable, but again, I have been wearing barefoot shoes for many years now so I am used to the more minimalist approach to footwear.  I wish they had more color offerings.  My last pair was chocolate brown and black and they went with everything and I looooved them, but the cushion going the whole shoe is nice on this version.Be aware that Xero shoes are notoriously slippery the first few days.  Break them in ahead of time if you're going to be near water or rain!People compliment me on them so I guess they are "cute enough (sorry, I don't know the "dude equivalent" of "cute!" I order men's sizes because they fit better)..."If you can get them on sale, so much the better.  I wear Xeros a LOT, but I only really feel they are worth it when they are on sale because the crafting just isn't on point and there are usually flaws.  Would happily pay more to know they were not made in sweat shops etc...Minimalist barefoot sandals that work? YesBest made shoes ever? NoWill last a lifetime? Not at all, maybe two summer seasons.Hope that helps! ;).

评论概述: Great Great Sandals, but Tricky To Adjust At First
评论详情: I love these sandals.  I almost exclusively run and walk barefoot, but because of cultural prejudice, it is not practical to go around in public or do long walks on sunny days in public places barefoot.  As unfair as it seems, probably the strongest irrational prejudice in western and American society is people going around barefoot, especially with all the problems with the homeless and drug addicts today.  No one even really thinks about it, they don't even think that anyone in their right mind would go without shoes.To demonstrate how silly this is, I wear these sandals when I can't go barefoot.  No one even thinks about it even though I am essentially barefoot in them.  As I said, it is an irrational cultural prejudice.IMPORTANT!!!  Do Not Mess With The Straps On Both Sandals (at first).  You must keep one sandal as it arrived from the factory, until you get the other to fit well.  The layout of these straps with the two buckles and the double cords and constricting holes in the sole is very, very clever and incredibly complex.  If you mess with both of them at the same time, you may never be able to get them right again.Fortunately, my right foot fit nearly perfectly out of the box, so I left it alone.  But I screwed around with the left sandal without knowing what I was doing and created a nightmare.  My toes hung over, it hurt to walk in it and it wouldn't stay on.  I was so frustrated I put them aside for a week.  I then decided to try to re-adjust the left sandal to match the right sandal.  This was not easy, it took several tries, setting the amount of cord coming out of the buckles to be identical with the other sandal, and then pulling and pushing the cords through the hole in the sole.  I finally got the left to look like the right, and put it on, and it it pretty well.  I then tightened one of the buckles closes to my heel about 1/4" on both sandals to get them to stay up on my heal, and viola! perfect fit, comfortable sandal.Unfortunately, I could find no instructions either on the website or in the package, so I was on my own.  I wouldn't blame others for just sending them back, but it isn't totally necessary.The other thing is if you haven't worn sandals with something between your toes, it will take a few wears for you to get used to them.  I now wear them everywhere.I do recommend that the manufacturer either create documentation on how the strap cords work and how to adjust them, or if such exists, make it easier to find.Great sandals!
Super lightweight,  good design,  comfortable,  good materials.
Size 6, total weight is 8.6 oz (4.3 oz each).  The image in the product description says a men’s size 9 is just over 5 oz, but it doesn’t specify that it isn’t the total weight. Just a heads up!

评论概述: Check your size before you buy
评论详情: I title this the way I did because if you don't go to the Xero Shoes website and print out the size guide, you might end up ordering one size to large. This isn't Xero Shoes fault, this is Amazon's for not having a link to the sizing guide.  With that out of the way, these are the most amazing sandals I've ever owned. I will likely not wear any other shoes from now on! They are incredibly comfortable for all day use and the "insoles" are very plush considering how thin these are. Everything they say they do, they do. If you want to see the true size of their collection, go to their site and shop there. I can't recommend these enough, y'all. You will wear them everywhere once you have them on. You almost forget they're there!
Love the way these feel but it came with the left foot between toe strap anchor cracked. The other side does not have this crack.

评论概述: These are everything they are advertised as!
评论详情: Great feel, fit, size it true, not pinching or sore spots.  Days later, still love these sandals!
They broke quickly

评论概述: Great sandal for  walking or short hikes
评论详情: Great sandal from xero, easy to get on and off and packs really tight. Used it on a 10 day beach trip as my daily sandal without any issues.
They are perfect for traveling, or even just going to the gym or beach.  The amount of room the take up is minimal.  They are also pretty comfortable considering.

I hate sandals, I hate flip flops! I’ve never worn sandals or flip flops because I wanted to. I bought these only because I needed help managing my athletes foot.  The straps on these are so small and soft that they don’t chafe or cause my feet to sweat. The part that goes in between the toes is so comfortable. The in between the toe part is why I hate flip flops, and the stupid noise, it sounds like a person smacking their lips. I hate it, but these don’t make a sound. The bottom is super durable yet extremely flexible. The grip on the bottom is incredibly grippy and the soft layer between the bottom and foot feels so comfortable. The cup on the heel ensures that they stay on my feet and the toe part never folds under my feet exposing my toes.  I recommend these to anyone who hates sandals or flip flops.  Ps. I’ve bought other sandals thinking maybe I was being too picky and I was wrong my whole life… nope, these sandals are way better than anything I tried. They might be for you or they might not be, but I say if you are getting sandals out of necessity and want to try something non traditional, try these.

Really well made and the sole is not too thick, but comfortable and has great grip for beating around a campsite or bathhouse. I used these on a recent motorcycle camping trip and they were nice to slide into when taking of riding boots.  You can adjust the lashing to your foot. They are also pretty light and don’t take up hardly any space. These are excellent for camping, traveling or just hanging out around the house sandal!

So light you almost forget they are there.  I look forward to use them more often as well as when traveling since they are light and take so little room in the luggage.  I ordered the size base on the 5-toe vibrams that I have a fit perfect.
Love the look but way too thin a sole for me although I have friends who love them. I went for a different style from this same brand and they are perfect

I will limit my comme to strictly how comfortable the sandals are to my feet. I finally found what I was looking for. I can literally keep this on all day. I forget I have them on.  I took some time to find the sweet spot, had to adjust them to my taste. I really thought having the tongue between my toes was going to be uncomfortable. It was weird at first, but once I adjust the straps and wore the sandals for a few hours. It became a none issue.  My feet love this sandals!  I will write a follow up report in time, to speak of their durability.
Not very good all xero shoes have terrible grip. But I like the wide toe box.

These sandals need just a little adjustment when you first try them on but are very light and comfortable. Super packable for backpacking since you can easily stick them in a front pocket of your pack or roll them up.

I've been a Five Finger Shoes customer for nearly fourteen years. I've always liked the design and how lightweight they were, but I didn't like the recent price, nor the plethora of negative reviews about the new materials they're made with these days. I didn't want to drop $100 when other long-time customers were complaining about poor fit, so I went looking for an alternative and found these.  I was unsure of the design, and I really had no idea what to expect from the soles, but the price was right, so I thought I'd try it.  I LOVE them!  I don't wear "shoes" and haven't for years. I've put up with wet feet, constricted toes, burning asphalt, and other problems with the Five Finger variety, but I have none of those issues with these sandals. I can walk on damp grass or concrete and my feet stay dry, my toes are free, and I can walk through a parking lot during summer without my feet being scorched.  I'm an AFAB person with wide feet, so I ordered a men's size as suggested on their site. I printed the size gauge on their site also. I wear a size 8.5W Women's, but there are no half sizes, and I was concerned the size 8 Men's might not work. It was a perfect fit!  Despite not wearing shoes for years, I did go through a break-in period. I had difficulties getting the ties right, even after watching their video. My right side was easy, but I struggled to get my left side situated. The knots hurt my foot bones, even though they weren't too tight, but the sensation went away as I figured out how to adjust the knots to my feet.  I have noticed my gait has changed, and I land on my toes and balls of my feet more than I did with the Five Finger Shoes. I've had them roughly a month, and my feet look more muscular and feel more flexible than before. My toes have also become more flexible, and I can splay them out more than before.  I'm extremely happy with these sandals! I'd highly recommend them to anyone into the barefoot thing.

I love these barefoot sandals. This time I purchased the aqua cloud model instead of the regular one with the all black footbed. These have a gray footbed molded into the black rubber. Like I said , I alive them as the ones before but I do notice that these have to be cleaned with soap more frequently than the others as they will develop an odor that I never had with the regular model I’ve purchased in the past. I’m a pool man that wears them all day and I really put them to test. Small price to pay I guess for the best sandals ever! Just thought I’d share my experience. Thanks for reading😎

I dislike the design, fit, and feel of these sandals. I wear a size 15 and ordered this, excited because this company makes shoes and sandals in my size. However these are poorly designed. The rope has to be pulled tight, which causes your heel to move forward so the thong part is firmly pressed between the big toe and index toe. Basically my big toe hangs way off the front of this sandal, with an inch of heel space not used, making it super uncomfortable. I do not recommend these sandals at all. I love their shoes, but their sandals are horrible. Do not waste your money buying these.

I have been wearing barefoot shoes for years and own other pairs of Xero shoes and enjoy them immensely. These were simply not it. Impossible to just simply walk at a normal gait without the toe section folding up under my foot. Also impossible to tighten down to the point that your foot isn't sliding all over the place on the sole until either your heel is hanging off. I tightened them until it hurt and this was still an issue. Unfortunately, had to return these immediately.
Really comfortable

A lot of money for a piece of rubber and some paracord. But oh so worth it!  So comfortable- have been wearing them everyday since I received them and my Achilles tendinitis has already greatly improved. I also feel much more secure and stable using stairs and walking on rough terrain. I can feel my entire body sigh with relief when I hit the ground wearing these!  I don’t want to go back to regular shoes and am dreading having to go to work without these. Ordered a pair of ballet flats for that purpose.  I hope these last for a reasonable amount of time. I am typically very hard on shoes.  I also wish there were some better styles. I love sandals but cannot wear them all the time in Ohio, nor can I wear them to work. Need more than a ballet flat- too girly. I would like to see a tougher and dressier looking Oxford or loafer.

评论概述: Sexy, minimalist, well made.  The perfect beach sandals.
评论详情: The perfect beach sandals.

I had been wanting a pair of these for quite some time and now I wish I'd bought them much sooner. Absolutely love them! They fit great and only needed a very small amount of adjusting to fit perfectly. Can't wait to get another pair or two!

I hated these when I got them thought it was a waste of money. Then I saw a video of how to fit. These are now my go to’s. Love them so great so worth it so dang nice to get a product that works. I will get more.  And more lol

I've been in minimalist shoes for almost 5 years now and never thought I would like toe thong shoes. But I took the plunge and I'm so happy I did. I literally don't want to wear anything else now. I've been through 3 or 4 pairs of xeros X-trails over the years and thought they were my favorite. But now my toes are stretching more and adjusted to less padding and the x-trails feel clunky and constricting now, so these are wider and more foot shaped. Also these are way better in water.  I've never tried any other sandals besides belenka leather ones and these are more foot shaped, but can't speak to others.  I also wear vivos and wildlings, and these are still my favorites.
Flimsy, not particularly comfortable, and they offer no protection to the side of the foot. I returned them.

评论概述: Stylish and Comfortable Water Sandals: Xero Shoes Aqua Cloud Review
评论详情: I recently discovered the Xero Shoes Aqua Cloud, a pair of minimalist men's water sandals with an extra-grippy sole, and I have been thoroughly impressed. These shoes have become my go-to footwear for various activities, and I couldn't be happier with their performance. Here's my review of the Xero Shoes Aqua Cloud, highlighting their travel-friendly nature, comfort, uniqueness, and ability to garner compliments.  First and foremost, these water sandals are fantastic for travel. Their lightweight design and compactness make them easy to pack, taking up minimal space in my luggage or backpack. Whether I'm heading to the beach, exploring new destinations, or embarking on outdoor adventures, the Aqua Clouds are always ready to accompany me. Their travel-friendly nature has proven to be incredibly convenient and efficient.  Comfort is a standout feature of the Xero Shoes Aqua Cloud. The sandals are meticulously designed to provide a comfortable fit and excellent support for the feet. The adjustable straps allow for a customized fit, ensuring that the sandals stay securely in place during activities. The soft and flexible sole offers just the right amount of cushioning, providing a pleasant walking experience even on extended journeys. I can confidently say that these sandals have become my go-to choice for all-day comfort.  One of the things I love most about the Aqua Clouds is their unique and eye-catching design. The combination of minimalistic aesthetics and vibrant color options sets them apart from other water sandals on the market. The sleek and modern appearance of these shoes has garnered numerous compliments from friends and strangers alike. I appreciate the attention to detail and the stylish touch they add to my overall look.  In addition to their style, the Aqua Clouds boast an extra-grippy sole, providing excellent traction on various surfaces. Whether walking on wet rocks or slippery surfaces, I feel confident in the stability and grip these sandals offer. The reliable traction enhances safety and allows me to enjoy my water activities without worrying about slips or falls.  In conclusion, the Xero Shoes Aqua Cloud water sandals have exceeded my expectations in terms of travel-friendliness, comfort, uniqueness, and style. Their lightweight and compact design makes them the perfect travel companion, while their comfortable fit and support make them ideal for all-day wear. The extra-grippy sole ensures stability and safety, enhancing my overall experience. Not to mention, the compliments I receive when wearing these sandals are an added bonus. If you're in search of stylish and comfortable water sandals that perform exceptionally well, I highly recommend giving the Xero Shoes Aqua Cloud a try.  Pros: 1. Travel-friendly design for easy packing. 2. Exceptional comfort and support for all-day wear. 3. Unique and eye-catching aesthetic. 4. Extra-grippy sole for reliable traction. 5. Garner compliments from friends and strangers.  Cons: None observed so far.  Experience the perfect blend of style, comfort, and performance with the Xero Shoes Aqua Cloud water sandals. Embrace their travel-friendly nature, relish in their all-day comfort, and enjoy the compliments that come your way. Elevate your water activities with these exceptional sandals that truly deliver on all fronts.

评论概述: Not for driving a manual transmission
评论详情: I was so close to loving these, but unfortunately I have to return them.  I drive a manual transmission vehicle, and several times now when using the clutch with my left foot, the sandal comes off, and sometimes, dangerously, the clutch pedal gets between my foot and the sandal, which prevents me from using the clutch without extricating the pedal from between my foot and sandal.  If you drive an automatic transmission, by all means these are fantastic... but if you drive a manual transmission they're a no go.  Or buy them either way, just don't drive your manual transmission car with them.
Es como caminar descalzo con protección

As someone who wears barefoot shoes for most exercise and casual activities, I thought these would be great sandals, and they are as long as you're walking less than about a half mile. I get some chafing and what feels like pinching right where the second toe meets the foot. It's almost like the sandal is too grippy against the bottom of my foot and is pulling the skin as I take a step. I can only walk a short distance in them before they get uncomfortable. I own some xero shoes and they're great. These sandals just don't work for me.
I use a minimalist shoes and I thought this will be the same, but it is not. The sandals are too long and very hard and unconfortable for my feet.
Awesome !!
I ordered this shoe multiple times and each time they were visibly used
My toes and feet have to work to keep on soles in the most practical way. But maybe it's how I walk but I love the shoes. Maybe the more expensive version of these sandals might support better

评论概述: Thanks Matt Graham for letting us know about this brand
评论详情: Fantastic for hiking and the beach!! Matt Graham talked about this brand in a video so if someone like him returns to this brand then why not?! Glad I bought these!!

评论概述: Strange uncomfortable foot bed. Not good in the water.
评论详情: I was very disappointed with these sandals. The foot bed is uncomfortable. It has a soft center and hard edges, it feels weird where the soft center and hard edges meet. It's super bothersome. I'd rather that the foot bed was all hard instead of this inconsistent design with a rigid transition from one to the other.  I'm also super disappointed that they are not water friendly. I can't wear them on the beach or in the water, they are flimsy and create the perfect drag when stepping through the sand or water. I jumped into a lake with then thinking they would be secure and not only did they creat a drag that caused me to take in water and struggle to the surface, but they started pulling off as I moved my feet through the water. They are dangerous and shouldn't be advertised as Aqua Sandals.  I love the Xero Genesis and recommend those for your barefoot feeling sandals. They also don't work in the sand or water, but are great for everyday activities.  I'm finding this company to be all over the place with sizing and design. They've been around long enough that they can't hide behind the excuse of being a small company anymore. I have six various pairs of Xero shoes and many of them were hard to size. I'm tired of buying shoes from a company that I can't trust. Luckily there are more and more manufacturers making barefoot shoes. I don't recommend these shoes or this company.
Son prácticas, ligeras, y con buen material.

评论概述: Worst minimalist sandals I’ve ever used
评论详情: Let me start by saying I like xero and their product line- I’m wearing a pair of their sneakers right now.  However these are not a solid piece of gear to look into. There’s an o ring that holds the front of the sandal in place and you can feel it digging into your foot constantly. Wildly noticeable and uncomfortable, if I can return them I will. How did this not get noticed as a hot spot before they were produced?  I will say that the sizing of the sandal to your foot, while annoying at first, is simple if not intuitive. However that doesn’t make up for their hard o ring in between your big toe.  Well made with quality, just uncomfortable
I love these more than flip flops, which is saying a lot. If weather permits, I’m wearing sandals.

Got them on clearance so not a total loss. My big toe hangs off the side most of the time. Getting them on and off is annoying with all the straps and the effort it takes to get the fit close to correct. Very light, came in handy as spare shoes  I could strap to a small sling pack for wet conditions.

I recently tore my Achilles and needed something minimal that did put pressure on the top of my foot. These were exactly what I was looking for. Easy to adjust and very light and comfortable. My wife and a couple friends have purchased a pair and were equally as happy. If you are looking for a wide and minimal sandal, look no further

My mom was having back problems and I thought it might be due to her shoes. I bought her a pair of these and also bought some for myself. These were terribly uncomfortable (we both agreed), hard to adjust, and walking up or down stairs in these is a huge liability, as the toes catch on everything.

评论概述: Pull the top knot up towards your ankle. Sandal works just as intended
评论详情: I bought a pair of these for camping-not for hiking but for easy access to footwear once getting out of my hammock or tent. They're light, no frills and easy to use. As title mentions, I had a bit of a hard time getting a good fit until I realized the top knot needs to be pulled towards your ankle.  Once I did that they fit like a dream.

As one who has been "barefooting" for about 15 years, I have looked at Xero shoes for a long time. And they have been around for a long time. I have made and worn home-made huaraches / sandals for years. Mine have been lacking specifically in the area of wet conditions. I bit the bullet and purchased these specifically for those conditions and they do not disappoint.  I have tested them at the river and in sweaty conditions. They performed great! I had to kinda crank down the tightness to keep them from flopping around as I normally wear my sandals pretty loose. The footbed grips reasonably well when wet / sweaty. Perhaps what makes them so much better is that these adjustments are so much easier. The dual-adjustable heel strap makes it super-simple to accommodate different wear conditions on the fly. My home-made knotting systems can be a bit fiddly to get the right fit so once I get them comfortable, I don't like to mess with them. These are very easy to adjust and comfortable across the range of adjustments.
These are great for rainy days or while out camping. Your feet with regular  flip flops will slip but these keep your feet on sandal when wet.
Ordentliche Fertigungsqualität. Bisschen aufwändig, die Riemen einzustellen, sitzen dann aber gut und  machen schöne Füße noch sexier 😊 Habe mehrere Paare in zwei Farben.

I have a flip flop hate. I know it's me. I know I should love their slap-slap convenience. But....  To keep them on, I end up walking at a speed glaciers flash their lights behind me to pass...  These little beauties are a game changer. Flip flops with a heel (cord). Light. Flat. Easy on. Stay on.  I now laugh as I pass the seasons in the slow lane.  Why not 5 stars? They do have a habit of flipping over at the toes (for me - right foot) which is a little aggravating. But only really when being pushed (walking in dunes). Flat surfaces are a dream.  A bit pricey - but they fill a need. A quiet, sole non-slapping need.

ルナサンダルも所持していて、（ワラーチマラソンスタイルって言うんですか？）こういうスタイルでフルマラソンをしています。サンダル自体のゼロシューズ系は本当に薄いです、ルナサンダルの１/3以下の厚みですが、実際歩いてみるとこの厚みでもクッション感がちゃんとあり、裸足で歩く痛みの数分の１で済みます。しかもルナサンダルのよりも紐部分の肌への当たり方が優しいので靴擦れになりません。ルナサンダルは靴擦れや豆が出来て苦労しています。値段もルナサンダルの半分だし、所持して損には、なりませんよ！普段から履くとか、マラソン以外に使用するのなら何の問題もありません（マラソンに使用するのなら覚悟が必要）
軽くて歩きやすいです。
Forse il miglior sandalo minimalista che io abbia mai provato. Il paio precedente dello stesso tipo mi è durato anni. Qualitá notevole. Prezzo decisamente alto.
nicht ganz, die Schlaufe zwischen den Zehen, das ist etwas gom Gefühl her zu rubbelig.
Really comfortable, so lightweight feels like walking barefoot.
噂通りの商品で快適です。サイズもいい感じに調節出来るので問題がありません。
軽くて歩きやすいです。

Un morceau de paracorde avec une semelle a ce prix la ... franchement ? J étais curieux de voir pourquoi ce prix la alors je les aient commandées. Deja le confort est inexistant ne compter pas marcher avec ca, ou pire courrir ! la finition est bonne et la semelle en bi matière a l air solide, mais honnêtement je ne comprend vraiment pas le prix ... je les aient renvoyées.

I've been a barefoot shoe wearer for about 5 years now, most recently wearing Furoshiki wrapping shoes from Vibram. Was heading out to Crete for a week of holiday and wanted a sandal that had the barefoot experience, but historically have not got along with flip-flops (foot strap rubs and cuts in) or sandals (heel rubs to a blister). Bought these a day before I flew out, because I'd been over analysing for several months leading up. Best decision I made was to get these. Same kind of walking experience as the vibrams, but open toes. Walking on sand or the hot pavement were fine. No rubbing or tightness. Didn't need to grip the sandal with my toes or arch, the adjustable band on the heel was perfect. I did have one or two experiences where the front on the sandal would get caught in the wet sand and would fold under the ball of the foot, but this was more a problem of me living my foot far enough up than any quality issue with the sandal. Would definitely buy another pair if these wore out (which, having worn these every day for at least 15km of sand and pavement walking every day for 7 days straight, was very minimal). If you're already a barefoot shoe wearer, these should be no issue for you. If you're new to barefoot, there might be a bit of a learning curve. Really solid quality of all materials and fixings.
Excelente agarre, cómodas, con esa verdadera sensación de pie descalzo. Hasta he corrido con ellas pero no son para eso, solo aceleran el desgaste, creo sería mejor buscar otra opción para correr.

Trotz der dicken Bänder kann man mit dem Schuh gut laufen, zumindest ohne Socken. Mit einem Gewicht von 320g (nachgewogen) aber eher nichts für den Trekkingrucksack. Ich behalte sie trotzdem zum Paddeln und für den Campingplatz. Die Verarbeitung wirkt gut.

Shoe fits size as expected, can be worn as flip flops or as sandals. They are very good, the only drawback is that the front portion of the shoe bends back while in use meaning the shoe steps on itself
Fue mi primer calzado barefoot y me costó adaptarme a llevar el pie tan “suelto” acabe el verano encantado con ellas. Fue un antes y un después para mis pies!

I'm not into hiking or someone you would find in the wilds, knee-deep in a raging river or somewhere like that! No, I just wanted a pair of very cool lightweight minimalist footwear that would suit my everyday needs this summer. These fit the bill perfectly. For anyone looking for a pair of great-looking sandals, but feel so light on your feet, I'd recommend this pair of Xero, Aqua footwear.
